ComicInfo.Summary:
Brooklyn Zirconia (Part One): A jewelry store robbery plays out, and when it makes the news, a man in a diner recognizes one of the perpetrators as his estranged brother.
Chapter One: Carmine's Apartment: Easton Newburn is an ex-cop on retainer to all the city's major crime families. He's sent to investigate the death of Carmine Albano. In the course of the investigation and resolution, he meets Emily.
ComicInfo.Title: Brooklyn Zirconia (Part One); Chapter One: Carmine's Apartment
